fulltext:
86 Binh Thoi Street, District 11,
Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam
E-mail: qkhai20@gmail.com
Website: https://www.linkedin.com/in/khai-
duong-444b2b7b/
Phone: (084) 916-734436
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Dedicated to optimization, an experienced DevOps Engineer understands the
combination of operations and development to quickly deliver code to customers.
Passionate and skilled in DevOps, Linux, developing software systems.
Skills:
Cloud: AWS 
SCM: Git (Gerrit, GitHub), SVN.
CI/CD: TeamCity, Jenkins, Hudson. 
Infrastructure as Code: Cloudformation, Ansible, Terraform.
Container and virtualization: Docker Engine, XEM, KVM, VMware.
Cluster manager: Rancher, Mesos, Marathon, Zookeeper, Docker Swarm.
Scripting: Bash, Python, Groovy
Monitoring: Nagios, Telegraf, Prometheus,  Grafana
Others: JIRA, Confluence, Slack, Microservices, Pair and Mod programming.
CORE QUALIFICATIONS
Monitoring, supporting and developing software systems in Python, investigating and
troubleshooting issues.
Assembling platforms and frameworks to automate business processes.
Research/Integration new tools/technologies such as Mesos, Marathon, Zookeeper,
Docker that will enhance their efficiency.
Build and improve team processes and workflow to maximize efficiency and
productivity.
QUALIFICATIONS
AWS (Acloud.guru)
Docker (Pluralsight)
Terraform (Pluralsight)
CCNA (Cisco, VNPro)
Git Essential Training (Lynda)
Python (Lynda)
WORK EXPERIENCE
Tyme Digital (CBA)
02/01/2019 — Present
Senior DevOps Engineer
Create / Implemented CI/CD process using TeamCity for the global development
team, allowing for dozens of code updates per hour with zero downtime
Actively manage, improve, and monitor cloud infrastructure on AWS, EC2, S3 and so
on, including backups, patches, and scaling.
Wrote Cloudformation and Ansible playbook to deploy, configure, and manage
servers.
Dương Quang Khải
1
Automated build and deployment using TeamCity to reduce human error and speed up
production processes.
SAP Lab Vietnam
Sep 2015 — 31/01/2018
DevOps Engineer
Duty:
The SAP HANA Database DevOps team manages the infrastructure for the HANA
product.
Supports continuous integration of C++ coding into the SAP HANA.
Sophisticated automated testing facilities and advanced release management
systems.
Major components are Git, Gerrit, Jenkins, Bugzilla, Mesos, Marathon, Zookeeper with
custom-tailored extensions in conjunction with in-house developed software.
Investigating and troubleshooting issues for automating testing framework.
GBST - HCM city (TMA's Project)
Jan 2015 — Sep 2015
DevOps Engineer
Duty:
Installing and maintaining for CI systems, Oracle database.
Scripting: Powershell, Groovy, Bash.
Monitoring and troubleshooting issue. 
Cross-team support for reviewing, and building/ testing code. 
TMA Solutions - HCM city
Aug 2014 — Aug 2015
Senior System Administrator
Duty:
Management internal services: DNS, DHCP, Routing, SVN, GIT, CVS, Jenkins, Op
OpenLDAP, Proxy.
Design server hard disk layout with multi-type RAID & LVM support.
Installing and maintaining the Hypervisor (Proxmox, KVM). 
Scripting: Bash.
Install and maintain services: Gitlab, Apache, Mysql, PHP, mail system and LDAP,
DC etc.
Operate backup & restore tasks.
Aotea Global Services - HCM city
January 2013 — Aug 2014
System Administrator
Duty:
Installing and maintaining services on AWS (EC2, IAM, S3 etc...).
Research new technologies/tools.
Install and maintain Mail server (ZCS 8), web servers (Apache2, Apache-tomcat 7).
Helpdesk.
EDUCATION
System Administrator and
Networking
2006 — 2010
NIIT School
Linux, Opensource services, Databases, Networking and so on
CCNA
Jan 2013 — Jul 2013
VNPro Center
Basic networking

Automated build and deployment using TeamCity to reduce human error and speed up production processes.

Duty: The SAP HANA Database DevOps team manages the infrastructure for the HANA product.
Supports continuous integration of C++ coding into the SAP HANA. Sophisticated automated testing facilities and advanced release management systems.
Major components are Git, Gerrit, Jenkins, Bugzilla, Mesos, Marathon, Zookeeper with custom-tailored extensions in conjunction with in-house developed software.
Investigating and troubleshooting issues for automating testing framework.

Duty: Installing and maintaining for CI systems, Oracle database.
Scripting: Powershell, Groovy, Bash. Monitoring and troubleshooting issue.
Cross-team support for reviewing, and building/ testing code.

Installing and maintaining the Hypervisor (Proxmox, KVM). Scripting: Bash. Install and maintain services: Gitlab, Apache, Mysql, PHP, mail system and LDAP, DC etc.
Operate backup & restore tasks.

Duty: Installing and maintaining services on AWS (EC2, IAM, S3 etc...).
